data.title: Jason G. H. Londt: A giant of South African entomology
meta_keywords: Asilidae        Bibliography        biography        Bittacidae        personalia        species descriptions
data.meta_description: To celebrate the 80th birthday of Jason G.H. Londt, we present a collection of articles in his honour. This introduction includes a summary of Jason’s life and career, an overview of the articles in the Festschrift, lists of his scientific and popular publications and a list of species named in his honour. Jason’s contribution to Mecoptera and Asilidae research in the Afrotropics is discussed, highlighting the impressive contributions he has made to the taxonomy, biology and ecology in both groups.
